short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make flashcards from your ChatGPT Conversations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create Anki flashcards from your ChatGPT conversations. Talk to ChatGPT, click the dolphin icon, autogenerate flashcards in 2 seconds, and send straight to Anki!

Card making recipes:
- Have ChatGPT summarise your lecture notes, and then make high-quality flashcards from your lecture notes
- Take a photo of your written notes, ask ChatGPT to summarize the photo, and make cards from your notes
- Ask ChatGPT about a hard question you are stuck on, and make some cards so you never have to ask it the same question twice


See chat2anki.com/setup for how to set up Anki (you will need to install the Anki Connect add-on)
